citeinfo.origin: CATS: Development Division - Corridor Project Team
citeinfo.title: cats.DBO.LYNXBlueLineStations_pt

descript.abstract: This shapefile contains all (existing and under construction) Blue Line Stations for the Charlotte Area Transit System (NC State Plane 1983 - feet projection)
descript.purpose: This is a view of the Light Rail Station locations (existing and under construction) for the entire LYNX Blue Line.

idinfo.accconst: This file was created for access to the CIP project team on the City of Charlotte's SDE server and for GIS employees and contractors of the City of Charlotte..
idinfo.useconst: This is a proposed view of the South Corridor Light Rail. Data represented in this file identifies the future location of the stations. This dataset can not be publicized or altered without the consent of the Charlotte Area Transit System.

cntinfo.cntinst: You may call the CATS receptionist at 704-336-6917 for another GIS contact if YaKeecha is not available.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

dataqual.logic: This dataset was created by the Charlotte Area Transit System (CATS).
dataqual.complete: This dataset represents the future location of the CATS South Corridor Light Rail stations at the time of creation. To obtain the most recent version of this data, please contact CATS.

enttyp.enttypd: PROPOSED locations of the South Corridor Light Rail stations

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: the name of the rail station

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

distinfo.resdesc: This dataset was created in the Development Division of the Charlotte Area Transit System.

cntinfo.cntinst: Please contact the South Corridor Project team for additional information.

distinfo.distliab: This dataset represent the location of the future South Corridor Light Rail stations (scheduled to be in service in summer 2007) at the time of publication. To obtain an updated copy of this dataset, please contact CATS. The dataset can not be used as a legal document as proof of the location of the stops. If this dataset is altered without the consent of CATS, the editor and/or secondary distributor assumes the responsibility and/or liabilities of any information contained within the dataset

cntinfo.cntinst: You may call the CATS receptionist at 704-336-6917 for another GIS contact if YaKeecha is not available.

dataIdInfo.idPurp: Blue Line Stations for the Charlotte Area Transit System
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Blue Line Stations for the Charlotte Area Transit System. This represents all the stations for the entire LYNX Blue Line .

Consts.useLimit: No changes can be made without the consent of CATS.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates
